title: Playdate
lyrics:
Toyoil achim
Deultteun mam beolsseo nal kkaeugo
Anjeolbujeolhae
Hancham-ina nam-eun sigandeul-i miwojyeo yeah
Golmoggil-ui geulimja
Jogeum deo gil-eojimyeon joh-a ije god

Neol delileo gal su iss-eoyo oh



Cheoeum-en aicheoleom mannassjyo

Oneul ulin eoleuncheoleom baby



Sijaghaeyo Playdate

U&I U&I U&I

Seollenayo geudaedo

Haengbogman jugo sip-eo dul-iseo

Bulbich alae Playdate

U&I U&I U&I

Sijaghaeyo Playdate Playdate Playdate



Cheoeum-en modeun ge jangnancheoleom sijaghae

Nae mam-eun keojyeogane Girl, you are just so perfect

Bom-ui balam tago neoege nal-aga yeah



Mwonga dallajyeossjyo uli sai

Can you feel it, can you feel it, baby



Sijaghaeyo Playdate

U&I U&I U&I

Seollenayo geudaedo (Playdate baby)

Haengbogman jugo sip-eo dul-iseo

Bulbich alae Playdate

U&I U&I U&I

Sijaghaeyo Playdate Playdate Playdate



Ulin ppajyeodeul-eo midnight

Heumppeog jeoj-eodeul-eo moonlight

I’ll take you on a playdate, girl

Salangbad-eul junbi dwaessnayo

Tteol-eojineun byeol-eul bad-a

Geudae son-e ollyeoduja

I’ll take you on a playdate, oh

I bam baby



Ij-ji ma oneul bam

Unmyeong-eun ulil ikkeuneun deushae

Is it love? mudneun geunyeo

Wae ajig moleuni



Aleumdaun neol ango maeil deo salanghago

Nan geugeosppun-in geol-yo i bam geu da-eum nalbuteojyo

Achim-ui seolleimdo bam-ui deultteun yeolgido

Neo eobs-in uimiga eobsjyo yeah

(Cause I need your love)



Sijaghaeyo Playdate

U&I U&I U&I

Seollenayo geudaedo (U&I)

Haengbogman jugo sip-eo dul-iseo

Bulbich alae Playdate

U&I U&I U&I

Sijaghaeyo Playdate Playdate Playdate



Ulin ppajyeodeul-eo midnight

Heumppeog jeoj-eodeul-eo moonlight

I’ll take you on a playdate, girl

Salangbad-eul junbi dwaessnayo

Tteol-eojineun byeol-eul bad-a

Geudae son-e ollyeoduja

I’ll take you on a playdate, oh

I bam baby

I’ll take you on a playdate
